extendedInfo.description: Once upon a time, in an ancient kingdom of the Far East, an extraordinary legend was told of a mysterious primate with special magical powers.Fate brought the mysterious primate to the Holy Monk, 'Sanzang'. And together they set out on a pilgrimage to the West for the Holy Scriptures, which were mankindâs only hope of redemption from the world then full of sin, greed and evil. Against countless demons, the pilgrimage marked the beginning of a continuous struggle between good and evilâ¦ and eventually both quietly vanished to nowhereâ¦As time flies, thousand years passed to nowadays prosperous world.  Yet many people still lives in miserable and weird things happen every dayâ¦ People are unaware that they are deeply in danger and even walking closer and closer to the depth. Can people hold the means to save themselves, or the superheroes in ancient myth will again save the world from the deep hell?TIPS:* Swipe to left for next page* Swipe to right for last page* Double tap to zoom in/out
